parameters.fetchXml:
<fetch>
  <entity name="msevtmgt_checkin">
    <all-attributes />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="msevtmgt_event" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/msevtmgt_eventid']}" />
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>

<fetch>
  <entity name="msevtmgt_checkin">
    <all-attributes />
    <filter>
      <condition attribute="msevtmgt_event" operator="eq" value="@{triggerOutputs()?['body/msevtmgt_eventid']}" />
      <condition attribute="statecode" operator="eq" value="0" />
    </filter>
  </entity>
</fetch>
